page.title: 19GT GADDESDEN SCHOOL cont.
page.content: A survey was taken of the 17 families who send children to the school and who were prepared to participate. FATHERS:Local born 5.Exercise or play sport 7. TRANSPORT to work by car 13. Time taken to travel to work: Less than half an hour,12 Between half and 1hr,2.More than 1hr,3 MOTHERS:Local born 4.HOMELIFE: Housewife 11;Fulltime job 4;Part-time5 Interests:Gardening 8;Reading 4;Sport4 Needlework 4. Children'RECREATION:Football 8;Scouts or Guides 4;Reading 4;Cycling 4. Travel to school:7 by car,8 walk & 2 often do both. HOLIDAYS are mainly spent in BRITISH ISLES and touring seemed to be most popular; 3 regularly go abroad. BIRTHPLACE of parents:Most common is Herts or neighbouring County. The rest equally divided between N.& S. of U.K.
